column4: i have just got one game and it's looks like blahblahblah.run how to install it? i tryed ./blah.run but says premision dinied... i try sudo ./blahblah.run but then- sudo: ./et-linux-2.60.x86.run: command not found so i don't get it... can enyone?
it's probably not executable. either chmod it to be executable, or use "sudo sh ./blah.run"
yes you are right the chmod  +x helped... thx
